text: We will hear arguments next in 73-641, Snow against the Commissioner of Internal Revenue.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
And what year was the prototype built?
Your Honor --
When did the work start on the prototype?
Many prototypes had been built prior to that time.
I see.
The prototype, to which we allude as existing in 1965, was a rather crude prototype model that admittedly did have some flaws in it.
You have skipped an important point, where was its office?
Your Honor, the office of Burns Investment Company was in the facilities of the closely-held corporation, Crossbow.
What?
No, Your Honor, it did not.
Let's all admit it, it didn't have a name on the door, it didn't have a telephone but where is the "business"?
The business --
Of that partnership, just the one, where was that business?
That business was located within the same building as Crossbow.
And the difference between that and Crossbow was what?
One was a partnership --
How many employees did this one have?
It did not have any employees directly.
How do you run a business without employees?
Mr. Trott was --
Don't you have to show, you have a partnership business in order to qualify?
Yes Your Honor, we have to show we have a partnership business.
I am waiting for you to show me the business.
Your Honor, we submit that his business is the research and the experimental activity carried on in perfecting the trash burner.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
Well, do you mean -- is your view of that that the trade or business will must already be an ongoing business?
Yes.
Has the service -- I assume this is outside the record.
That Mr. Justice Blackmun is outside the record.
And perhaps the other partnerships too would.
Perhaps Echo and Courier also went the same way as we had --
So, you have to be an ongoing business agreement?
Yes.
Mr. Smith, you state that the Government position is that there must be an ongoing trade or business.
I think it probably would, Mr. Justice Powell.
Would it make any difference at all if the incinerator works totally dissimilar to the other product than being manufactured?
Well, apparently, there are instances.
If I may Mr. Chief Justice, I believe I have my two minutes remaining.
You have four minutes now.
If I may respond to the last comment first.
What's that section again, Mr. Doan?
That is Section 248, Your Honor.
Thank you gentlemen.
